item.description: Cloud Provider BaiduCloud Table of Contents Table of Contents Summary Motivation Goals Non-Goals Requirements Proposal Summary Baidu is a gold member of CNCF and we have a large team working on Kubernetes and related projects like complex scheduling, heterogeneous computing, auto-scaling etc. We build cloud platform to support Baidu emerging business including autonomous driving, deep learning, blockchain by leveraging Kubernetes.
